resources.string: To scan a QR code, point the phone at the QR code until it appears centered on the screen
Without the permissions of the camera you will not be able to scan the QR codes of the desired work.
The NFC sensor is disabled. Please activate it on your device and try again.
To analyze the NFC sticker, activate the NFC sensor on your device and attach it to the NFC tag on the back of the device. If you want to scan a QR instead of NFC, click the next button.
Are you sure you want to exit the application?
In order to scan a QR code you need to give the application the permissions to use the camera.
Without the permissions of the camera you will not be able to scan the QR codes of the desired work.\nTry again?
In order to scan an NFC code you need to give the application the permissions to use the NFC sensor.
In order to scan an NFC code you need to give the application the permissions to use the NFC sensor.\nTry again?
Welcome to Museums For Everyone, the application for the Fundación Caja Granada Museum. Through this application you can explore all the contents of the museum. Shall we begin?

Then you can select the accessibility settings you want for the application or enter directly into the museum. Among the accessibility options can be chosen tools of voice narration or texts and videos adapted for sign language
Aerial photograph of the museum fundacion granada
Guided tour of the museum. Button.
In the main menu you will find the most important options of the application.
\"During the visit to the museum you will find codes that you can scan using the scan code button and thereby learn more about the works.\"
You can also list all the works available in the museum using the button list works and select the desired category.
By selecting the button of guided tours you can tour the museum\'s works in different types of visits programmed by the museum.
\"By clicking the menu icon in the upper left corner or by sliding your finger from the left side to the center of the screen you can open the side menu in any section of the application.\"
Accessibility options. Adjust the accessibility tools available. Button.
Enter the main content of the application. Button.
Accessibility options.\nAdjust the accessibility tools available.
" Enter the main content of the application."
Alternative texts in all images and videos of the application.
Alternative texts in all images and videos of the application. Button.
Adapted texts and videos in sign language.
Adapted texts and videos in sign language. Button.
Narration of alternative texts has been activated in images and videos.
To re-adjust the accessibility options, the language or to re-display the instructions go at any time to preferences.
There is no mail client installed.
It is an application to help make the visits to the Fundación Caja Granada Museum.
The application is fully developed by the startup
If you need to contact us fill the following form:
The sign language tool has been activated. With it the videos of the contents of the museum will appear in sign language.
